sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-card class="pb-4">
        <!-- <alert-component :texto-alerta="textoAlerta" :tipo='tipoAlerta' v-if="alertaEmpresa == true"/> -->
        <alert-component :texto-alerta="textoAlerta" :tipo='tipoAlerta' v-if="alerta == true"/>
        <v-card-title>Empresas</v-card-title>
            <v-card class="ma-3"
                v-for="empresa in empresas" 
                :key="empresa.id"
                @click="Acessar(empresa)">
                <v-card-text 
                    class="color-font"
                    :size="16">
                    <v-row>
                        <v-col cols="2">
                            <v-avatar
                                class="profile"
                                color="grey"
                                size="100"
                                tile
                            >
                                <v-img src="https://cdn.vuetifyjs.com/images/profiles/marcus.jpg"></v-img>
                            </v-avatar>
                        </v-col>
                        <v-col cols="10">
                            <v-row class="py-5">
                                {{ empresa.nome }}
                            </v-row>
                            <v-row class="color-font-inside">
                                {{ empresa.endereco }}
                            </v-row>
                            <v-row class="color-font-inside">
                                {{ empresa.telefone }}
                            </v-row>
                        </v-col>
                    </v-row>
                </v-card-text>
            </v-card>
            <load-component :Ativo="loader"/>
    </v-card>
</template>
<script>
import api from '@/services/api';
import AlertComponent from './AlertComponent.vue';
import LoadComponent from './LoadComponent.vue';
import GenericMethods from '@/mixins/GenericMethods';

export default {
  components: { AlertComponent, LoadComponent },
    name: 'EmpresasComponent',

    mixins: [GenericMethods],

    data: () => ({
        empresas: []
    }),
    methods: {
        Acessar(empresa) {
            this.$emit('dadosEmpresa', empresa)
        },
        // EnableAlert(texto, tipoAlerta) {
        //     this.alertaEmpresa = true
        //     this.tipoAlerta = tipoAlerta
        //     this.textoAlerta = texto

        //     setTimeout(() => {
        //         this.alertaEmpresa = false
        //     }, 1800)
        // },
    },
    
    created() {
        this.loader = !this.loader;
        
        api.get('Empresa')
        .then(response => {
            response.data.forEach(element => {
               this.empresas.push({
                    id: element.id,
                    nome: element.nome,
                    endereco: element.endereco.logradouro + '/' + element.endereco.bairro,
                    telefone: element.telefone
               })
            });
        })
        .catch(error => {
            this.EnableAlert(error.message, "error")
            console.log(error)
        })
        .finally(() => (this.loader = !this.loader))
    },
    mounted() {
        
    }
}
</script>
<style>
    .color-font {
        color: black !important;
        font-size: x-large;
    }

    .color-font-inside {
        font-size: large;
    }
</style>
